requirements.description: Your application or service can only collect, store, process or use data of end users (including any personal data or information) if it complies with the privacy policy and other requirements
You must establish a privacy policy that clearly and accurately describes to end users what personal data you collect and how you use and share such information
Your privacy policy must comply with and be consistent with the terms and requirements set out in the Agreement and the WeChat or Weixin Privacy Policy

type.summary: Compliance with Agreement and WeChat/Weixin Privacy Policy

requirements.description: Processing of personal data can only take place if you obtain users' express consent to such processing at the time you request such data

type.summary: Obtain Express Consent for Personal Data Processing
